bibl.title: The Lost Tomb of Alexander The Great.
bibl.note: tabl., nombr. figg et pll. n./bl. et coul.

Prologue: Alexander's afterlife. - Dramatis personae: our sources. - 1. Death in Babylon. - 2. Funeral games. - 3. The capital of memory. - 4. The shrine of the Caesars. - 5. Vanished from History. - 6. The mysteries of the mosques. - 7. The astronomer's chart. - 8. The Latin cemeteries and the Shallalat Gardens. - 9. A candidate for the corpse. - Conclusion. - Bibliography. Index.
